description:
Remove 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 10-speed freewheels from Shimano®, Sun Race®, DNP®, Sachs®, etc.

  • Made of tough, heat-treated alloy steel for years of reliable service
  • Enlarged pass-through hole accommodates up to 14mm axles
  • Thin walls fit a freewheel's 12 splines without removing the hub cones and locknuts
  • 1-inch base fits wrench or bench vise
name: Park Tool FR 1.3 Freewheel Remover - Shimano
